comments.body: Really impressed by the ANN thread design. So which country payment methods are available, if a person wants to deposit in FIAT?I can also see that you have a deposit bonus, it would be great if you can also mention about the wagering requirements that we need to fulfil in order to withdraw the funds.The site seems promising to me, just do some great promotions, and I am sure you will get potential gamblers from here.

comments.author: hd49728
comments.body: How about using VPN and rules to use AML/ KYC for withdrawal?Do you accept VPN?Do you accept coin in deposit from mixers?What rules will be used for AML and KYC against users?What is a max win bet you will pay on your casino?Your terms for Second and Third deposit is the same?

comments.author: AbuBhakar
comments.body: Quote from: hd49728 on July 29, 2022, 02:26:45 PMHow about using VPN and rules to use AML/ KYC for withdrawal?Do you accept VPN?Do you accept coin in deposit from mixers?What rules will be used for AML and KYC against users?What is a max win bet you will pay on your casino?Your terms for Second and Third deposit is the same?There ToS stated that Using VPN to bypass provider's block is strictly prohibited and may lead to confiscation of winnings. You are only allowed to use VPN if you are just using it for your privacy and not for accessing games that restricted to your country.I saw this interesting terms under Use of Player account.QuoteWe reserve the right to make a phone call to the number provided in your user account, which at our own discretion can be a necessary part of the KYC procedure. Withdrawals may be terminated until the account is fully verified. We will make reasonable efforts trying to contact you regarding the withdrawal of the funds, but if we are not able to reach you (by email or phone) in two (2) weeks as from the date of the request for withdrawal, account will be locked, since you have failed to pass the KYC procedure.Lastly max bet usually varies in each games based on the software provider limits.
